example.text: Democrats and Republicans agree—our immigration system is broken. But rather than work on a bipartisan solution, [[user]]'s extreme bill does nothing to secure our border and would derail the economy while throwing families legally seeking asylum in jail. [[url]]

I had a great meeting with [[user]] leaders to discuss local issues, federal funding opportunities, & ways that we can work together to best serve our constituents. I’m grateful for the productive conversation & am proud to represent such a special community in Congress. [[url]]
